name: Protector of Atemia
description:
======Controls============
A / Left Arrow to move left

D / Right Arrow to move Right

W / Up Arrow to Attack , must wait for the swordwoman back to attack again

[R in main menu to reset data *NOT RECCOMENDED*]

Block enemy with the shields to kill the enemy

=======Description=========
Defend the Kart filled with important artefact from raiders with a guy with shield and a lady with a sword,

Fun fact : this game is inspired by "Rising of the Shield Hero" anime

========More=============

***Special thanks to***
-Dhyox
-Chaizy Nasucha
for supporting me :D
